channel.title: How to make a warning message for an npc, read on
channel.description: i have a demise pking source and client, so i believe it's a delta base. i have certain npcs that teleport you, but i'd like to have one with a warning message before it teleports you. not just text in the text box, but like one of those things that overlay the text box and would ask if you'd like to continue. thanks :P

item.title: How to make a warning message for an npc, read on
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

sendFrame126("WARNING HERE", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886);
if you didnt know put that before the toX and toY(where the npc teleports you.)

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a warning message for an npc, read on
